summary: This refers to concepts and resources connected by an overarching theme. It encompasses a variety of topics from biological ecosystems to business strategies. The articles explore how biological ecosystems confined to space and time have influenced modern, decentralized organizational structures. Courses address recognizing strengths and weaknesses and the importance of strategic connections.
excerpt: Biological ecosystems are specific to space and time, but the term ecosystem has been broadened to describe non-natural organizations, underscoring a shift towards organic, decentralized structures.
